entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:51 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h near noon then light in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
